2017.promo.bewear.sleeve.description: Give your deck a new look with card sleeves featuring the dangerous Bewear!\n\nThis offer runs through March 31, 2017.
2017.promo.bewear.sleeve.name: Bewear Card Sleeves
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Snover during your opponent's next turn.
Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard the top card from your opponent's deck.
The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
specialvisualizations.cannotplayacespec: This player can't play ACE SPEC cards from their hand.
specialvisualizations.player.bw8_46.dual: This player may play 2 Supporter cards during their turn.
specialvisualizations.player.cannotplaye: This player can't play any Pokémon from their hand to evolve their Pokémon.
specialvisualizations.player.silentlab: Basic Pokémon in play, in each player's hand, and in each player's discard pile have no Abilities.
specialvisualizations.player.xy7_74.fore: Each {G} Pokémon can evolve on the first turn or during the turn it is played.
trade.partnerignored.cantcreateoffer: You can't create a trade with this player.
